references.paper_title: Surrogate regret bounds for bipartite ranking via strongly proper losses
references.reason: This paper provides theoretical foundations for AUC optimization, which is the core methodology of the proposed AUCSeg.

references.paper_title: Generalization bounds for the area under the roc curve
references.reason: This paper establishes theoretical guarantees for AUC, a key metric used in the proposed AUC-oriented method.

references.paper_title: Fully convolutional networks for semantic segmentation
references.reason: This foundational paper introduces the fully convolutional network architecture, a cornerstone of modern semantic segmentation models, including the one used in the paper.

references.paper_title: Learning with multiclass auc: Theory and algorithms
references.reason: This work presents the theoretical foundation and algorithms for multi-class AUC optimization, directly addressing the core problem of the paper.

references.paper_title: Auc-oriented domain adaptation: From theory to algorithm
references.reason: This paper extends AUC optimization to domain adaptation, showcasing its broader applicability and relevance to the challenges faced in long-tail semantic segmentation.
